text: Vladimir Miljković (; born 1 July 1984) is a Serbian football midfielder. ==References== ==External links== * * Vladimir Miljković stats at footballdatabase.eu Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:People from Vranje Category:Association football midfielders Category:Serbian footballers Category:FK Jedinstvo Ub players Category:FK Bežanija players Category:FK Radnički Obrenovac players Category:FK Napredak Kruševac players Category:FK Srem players Category:FK Voždovac players Category:FK Zemun players Category:FK Modriča players Category:FK Dečić players Category:Serbian SuperLiga players Category:Montenegrin First League players
